name: 7th International Conference on Modern Research in Education, Teaching and Learning
content: The 7th International Conference on Modern Research in Education, Teaching and Learning will take place on March 27–29, 2024 in Oxford, United Kingdom. Bringing together academia, researchers, and scholars for three days of learning and networking, ICMETL 2024 is a must-attend event of the year. The program is designed to address the latest trends and common challenges in the field. Every presentation will feature unique insights into the most pressing topics, be it the role of technology in education, the cultural and geographical differences in approaches, the latest methodologies, and dozens of others. To ensure that you have a rounded experience of the event, we will complement the learning aspects of the event with social activities, including a free guided tour of Oxford – one of the most beautiful cities in the world that plays a prominent role in the world’s economy and cultural development.
